Title: Then...and Again
Plot: Allison and Devalos are shot and Allison awakens in 2004, five years earlier and now nine months pregnant with her third child, Marie. Allison's dreams informs her about an innocent man who will be convicted of murder, and she works to clear his name.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: David Barry Gray, Nathan Hunsecker, Ginifer King, Kevin Brief, Jeremiah Birkett, Lina Patel, Scott Holroyd
